card.name: CA02 Insectiform Vukoroq
card.text: If you control a Planet, CA02 Insectiform Vukoroq enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: UA03 Vukoroq Invader
card.text: When UA03 Vukoroq Invader enters the battlefield, exile the top card of each opponent’s library. UA03 Vukoroq Invader gets +1/+1 as long as there’s a creature card exiled with it, has hexproof as long as there’s a land card exiled with it, and has menace as long as there’s a noncreature nonland card exiled with it.

card.text: Ocean World enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, you may conjure a card named Enter the Unknown or Umarian Leviathan on top of your library. T: Add G or U.

card.name: Uncharted Wildworld
card.text: Jungle World enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, each player creates a 1/1 green Insect creature token. T: Add G.

card.name: Uninhabited Cubelet
card.text: T, Sacrifice Unexplored Planet: Conjure a card named Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, or Forest onto the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Valan the Tombworld
card.text: Valan, the Tombworld enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, conjure a card named People of Valan into your graveyard. T: Add B.

card.name: Varats Domain
card.text: T: Add C. 3, T, Sacrifice Desert Planet: Draw a card.

card.name: The Vespian Gas Mines
card.text: Gas Giant enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, you may conjure a card named Living Storm or Nothing But Sky on top of your library. T: Add U or R.

card.name: Viro Vu Refuge of the Forgotten
card.text: Slum Planet enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, you may conjure a card named Outcast’s Wisdom or Think for Yourself on top of your library. T: Add B or R.

card.name: Vukoroq Duneworld
card.text: T: Add C. 3, T, Sacrifice Desert Planet: Draw a card.

card.name: Vukoroq Factory-Sphere
card.text: When Forge World enters the battlefield, you may conjure a card named Automated Warbot or Mass-Produced Weapons on top of your library. T: Add C.

card.name: World of Cats
card.text: Civilized World enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, each player gains 3 life. T: Add W.

card.name: World of Uploads
card.text: City World enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, each player may scry 2. T: Add U.

card.name: World Tree
card.text: Jungle World enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, each player creates a 1/1 green Insect creature token. T: Add G.

card.name: Xax Indentured Civilization
card.text: Subjugated Colony enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, you may conjure a card named Ace Pilot or City-Killer on top of your library. T: Add W or B.

card.name: Xelek Interstellar University
card.text: Precursortech Ringworld enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, you may conjure a card named Precursortech Guardian or Xenoarchaeology on top of your library. T: Add W or U.

card.name: Yjinj Well-Protected Paradise
card.text: Pleasure Planet enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, you may conjure a card named Galactic Tourists or Blissful Vacation on top of your library. T: Add R or W.

card.name: Yjinjian Wall-World
card.text: Fortress Planet enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, you may conjure a card named Orbital Fortifications on top of your library. T: Add W.

card.name: Zeptulon II
card.text: Volcanic Planet enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, you may conjure a card named Diacron Crystalform on top of your library. T: Add R.

card.name: Zeptulon IX
card.text: Frozen Planet enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, you may conjure a card named Crippling Chill on top of your library. T: Add U.

card.name: Welcome to My World
card.text: Conjure any number of your homeworld’s geographies, inhabitants, and/or events on top of your library in any order. Draw a card.

card.name: The Armies of My People
card.text: Conjure two of your homeworld’s inhabitant into your hand.

card.name: Homeworld Secrets
card.text: Conjure your homeworld’s geography, inhabitant, and event into your hand.

card.name: Iru Cargo-Cultists Paradise
card.text: (Reveal one homeworld from outside the game before drawing opening hands.) Geography — City World Inhabitant — Ghost of the Machine Event — Xenoarchaeology

card.name: Orv Utter Dystopia
card.text: (Reveal one homeworld from outside the game before drawing opening hands.) Geography — Swamp Inhabitant — Orvian Troops Event — Moral Quandary

card.name: Rule the World
card.text: Conjure your homeworld’s geography and inhabitant into your hand. You lose 2 life.

card.name: Giramar IV
card.text: (Reveal one homeworld from outside the game before drawing opening hands.) Geography — Mountain Inhabitant — Techno-Shaman Event — Crowning Moment

card.name: Quantum Flux
card.text: Conjure your homeworld’s inhabitant, geography, or event into exile. You may play that card this turn.

card.name: World Spirit
card.text: When World Spirit enters the battlefield, conjure your homeworld’s geography onto the battlefield.

card.name: Xixizzb Birthplace of the Hive
card.text: (Reveal one homeworld from outside the game before drawing opening hands.) Geography — Jungle Planet Inhabitant — Hive Queen Event — Close Encounter
